price: 37 chacun étant suffisamment préoccupé par son sort.
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
